attributes.action: Return the Webster children to their parents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mark and Nicky Webster's three eldest children were taken into care in 2004 after doctors claimed that six tiny fractures found on the middle child had been inflicted deliberately. All three were adopted.

In a failed attempt to have the adoption order overturned, the couple were told that even though they could be victims of a miscarriage of justice it was 'too late' for them to be reunited with their daughter and two sons.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
